alert.note: Alert for Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 22 at 11:47PM AKDT until August 23 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will likely wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting over 40 mph will continue tonight. These winds are pushing waves high up the beach to near the vegetation line causing minor erosion and washing away items left on the beach. Winds and waves will decrease overnight south of Point Lay, and will decrease Wednesday morning from Point Lay north.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
